module.name: Call Event Logging
module.changelog: *13.0.26.12* Packaging of ver 13.0.26.12 *13.0.26.11* FREEI-1762 *13.0.26.10* FREEPBX-20556 XSS in page.cel_view.php *13.0.26.9* FREEPBX-18676 Webpage mentioned on the banner on top of the asterisk.conf files is no longer there (404) *13.0.26.8* FREEPBX-19506 Search option under Call Event Logging is not functional *13.0.26.7* Bring back validate function *13.0.26.6* Fix sorting *13.0.26.5* FREEPBX-10883 FREEPBX-11014 CEL within UCP - PHP Fatal error *13.0.26.4* FREEPBX-16337 CDRDBHOST not following AMPDBHOST when empty *13.0.26.3* FREEPBX-17187 Don't set all fields to empty default when a new search is issued in Call Event Logging *13.0.26.2* FREEPBX-13360 Missing configuration option for CELDBNAME variable *13.0.26.1* FREEPBX-14044 Speed up upgrades *13.0.26* Increase size of appdata *13.0.25* FREEPBX-12997 Connection should be UTF8 *13.0.24* FREEPBX-12783 The two options are backwards in UCP Allow Playback and Allow Downloads *13.0.23* FREEPBX-12361 XSS in sub argument *13.0.22* Use mime type checks for ucp downloads *13.0.21* FREEPBX-11816 Better descriptions of how long to process the upgrade *13.0.20* FREEPBX-10571 remove repeat add restart button to player *13.0.19* If doing intense operations set time limit to 0 *13.0.18* Allow installs on older Asterisk versions *13.0.17* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.16* Fix incorrect spanish translations when in English *13.0.15* Fix cel module so it actually works on a new install by lidl *13.0.14* FREEPBX-10397 FREEPBX-10895 *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10816 *13.0.12* Fix bad class reference *13.0.11* FREEPBX-10771 *13.0.10* Use boostrap tables and new HTML5 player *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10478 Array validation *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9384 Extensions in UCP need to be strings not integers *13.0.7* Fix permission management in User Manager *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10286 better check on columns for CEL records *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10113 Address issues brought up by Chris *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9986 invalid port declaration *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9610 Cannot access Call History or Call Event Logs *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-9408 Fixes to invalid array looping *13.0.1alpha2* Groups in usermanager *13.0.1alpha1* First beta release.
module.description: The Call Event Logging module allows you to see all inbound and outbound calls for your user and listen to any call recordings that are associated with that call.
